Actions.Text: REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION

Title: Allows the president of the citywide council on high schools to participate in the selection of the members of the board of education elected by the community district education council presidents
Summary: Allows the president of the citywide council on high schools to participate in the selection of the members of the board of education elected by the community district education council presidents.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to allowing the president of the citywide council on high schools to participate in the selection of the members of the board of education elected by the community district education council presidents
